TopicTitle: i want graphs for the economy

Articles.Content:
I find,personaly it realy dificult to see how i do in my career,seeing if i made some profit,or to see if im crashing in to the ground,not by rocket,but by funds

That is one of my many problems with the economy in the game ATM,like the funds meter in the VAB or the contract spaming for all the contracts,making all contracts fell repeted like 20 times in a row

i would see what you guys have to say about this
seems to be legit. i approve!
Yea, that would definitely add a lot of realism to me. Now that you mentioned this, I don't get why they didn't. Great idea bud, keep them coming! I look forward to seeing it one day.
